about_the_game:
The GUILTY GEAR -STRIVE- Original Soundtrack is now available, with 25 total tracks including previously unreleased songs!
The 2-CD set contains 25 songs, including all 24 vocal tracks taken from Season Pass 1, plus 1 new unreleased song!
Unprecedented for a fighting game, every character has a dedicated vocal track, where their backbone and drama are strongly projected in the song.
Be sure to check out the rocking sounds of this soundtrack, that itself can be considered a rock album, with General Director Daisuke Ishiwatari as it's composer!

Normal version: 192kbps/mp3
Hi-Quality version: uncompressed/wav
